definition: to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
smile (archaic)
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow

sentences.english: She tried to pipe him off.
sentences.chinese: 她想从他那里探听些消息。

sentences.english: She comes every day in the shape of an old gentleman to inquire after you.
sentences.chinese: 她每天让一位老先生来代她探听你的消息。

sentences.english: Chen sky, but do not have to go to the hospital to LiangGongYu this man.
sentences.chinese: 陈顶天去医院，却没有探听到梁红玉这个人。

sentences.english: 13Peter knocked at the outer entrance, and a servant girl named Rhoda came to answer the door.
sentences.chinese: 彼得敲外门，有一个使女，名叫罗大出来探听。

sentences.english: I'm never interested in nosing out the details of someone else's private life.
sentences.chinese: 我从不喜欢探听别人私生活的细节。
你已探听出他的看法吗？

sentences.english: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate, a damsel came to hearken, named Rhoda.
sentences.chinese: 彼得敲外门，有一个使女，名叫罗大出来探听。

sentences.english: Peter knocked at the outer entrance, and a servant girl named Rhoda came to answer the door.
sentences.chinese: 彼得敲外门，有一个使女，名叫罗大出来探听。

sentences.english: Several months later, the elder sister, south to sweet words of XiaoMin restaurant snoop.
sentences.chinese: 几个月后，敦南来到甜姐的餐馆探听小敏的音讯。

sentences.english: David sent out spies and learned that Saul had come.
sentences.chinese: 就打发人去探听，便知道扫罗果然来到。

sentences.english: Where did you get my number anyway?
sentences.chinese: 您是从哪探听到我的电话的？

sentences.english: She has been drumming every office.
sentences.chinese: 她一直在探听各个办公室的虚实。

sentences.english: She is hostile to people who go poking into her private affairs.
sentences.chinese: 她非常讨厌那些探听她私事的人。

sentences.english: John asked Dave to feel Jane out about whether she’d be interested in going out with him.
sentences.chinese: 约翰要求戴夫探听简是否有兴趣和他出去。

sentences.english: That man will nose out a scandal anywhere .
sentences.chinese: 那个人在什么地方都会探听出丑闻。
